per_result_reports.notes: Peak position matches within digitization uncertainty

figure_comparisons.notes: Excellent agreement between simulation and paper

classification_rationale: Peak position error of 0.3% is well within acceptable range. Spectral shape and width match paper figure closely.
confidence_reason: Good quantitative match on peak position; some uncertainty in absolute extinction values due to normalization
confidence_factors: Digitized reference data available for quantitative comparison
Spectral resolution adequate for peak identification
Single well-defined peak makes comparison straightforward
recommendations: Consider higher resolution run if absolute extinction values are critical
Verify material data covers full wavelength range
summary: Simulation results show good agreement with paper figures. Extinction peak at 702 nm vs 700 nm in paper (0.3% error). The spectral shape and width match well. Overall classification: ACCEPTABLE_MATCH with high confidence.
